title: Add a ShowContactTask to show a specific contact's details
body: If I have an app that shows a filtered subset of a user's contacts, I should have a way to click on that user and show the user's details in the native experience.

comments.body: I would love to have this so I wouldn't have to create all the UI to store and edit contacts within each app. But to complete this there would also need to be a ContactChooser that returns a key that could be passed into ShowContactTask. Please add support for this.
